item.title: Building Materials, 28th January
item.description:
Email received by CSC inbox 27/01/26 14:26 Commercial Waste/Recycling Lat/Long - 51.4033303, 0.1062693 what3words - fishery.hours.baked Nearest address - 77 Haverstock Court, Cotmandene Crescent, Orpington, BR5 2RD Discarded building materials Reference - 5278806 Map link - open Google map Report history - Status: Received 27/01/2026 14:25 Discarded building materials
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 88-90, Cotmandene Crescent, St Paul's Cray, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: O/s 76 Hansol road broken slab, 28th January
item.description:
I have raised this issue before as the 3 broken slabs. When this was first raised it was because an old lady tripped and fell over the uneven slabs and this was marked as not required to fix. Since then a child has fallen over. Now with the rain the water has seeped beneath the slabs which are more unstable and while running down the pavement This is an immediate risk to fall with 3 uneven broken slabs with are rocking. Please can this be taken seriously and repaired.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hansol Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Assumed fly-tipped caravan, 28th January
item.description:
This caravan appeared at the end of Holme Lacey Road (near the LTN cameras) at the end of last week. It is an eyesore and has no plates. I assume it has been fly tipped as it is in a very poor state. Not sure if someone has a permit for it. Please could you investigate? Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holme Lacey Road, Hither Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 28th January
item.description:
Large pothole at the junction has been getting worse by the day. This has been present here since last year, and you are aware. There was even a rolling road closure in Tudor way in early Jan for road repairs and this was still not fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tudor Way, Poverest, Greater London
